snippet: The unpredictability of the Republican race so far makes a good case for betting on Rick Santorum, who is given just a 13 percent chance of winning the G.O.P. presidential nomination on Intrade right now.
abstract: The unpredictability of the Republican race so far makes a good case for betting on Rick Santorum, who is given just a 13 percent chance of winning the G.O.P. presidential nomination on Intrade right now.
